languages.text: "Даже если бы мы хотели, мон-кай, камень душ невозможно воссоздать так просто. Однако я не стану посвящать тебя в тайны моего народа, ибо в том, что случилось с Изгоем, есть и твоя вина".

"Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."
languages.original_text: "Даже если бы мы хотели, мон-кай, камень душ невозможно воссоздать так просто. Однако я не стану посвящать тебя в тайны моего народа, ибо в том, что случилось с Изгоем, есть и твоя вина".

traits.locale_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kinsmen, because you are also at fault for what had happened to the Outcast."

"Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kinsmen, because you are also at fault for what had happened to the Outcast."

"Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

"Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

"Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

languages.text: “即便我们愿意帮忙，猴子，再造灵魂石也不是那么简单的事。不过，我不会让你知晓我族人的秘密，毕竟发生在流浪者身上的这一切，你也有很大责任。”
languages.original_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

traits.locale_text: “即便我们愿意帮忙，猴子，再造灵魂石也不是那么简单的事。不过，我不会让你知晓我族人的秘密，毕竟发生在流浪者身上的这一切，你也有很大责任。”

languages.text: «Incluso aunque quisiéramos, mon-keigh, es imposible reproducir fácilmente una joya espiritual. Pero no te revelaré los secretos de mi especie, pues también tú tienes la culpa de lo que le ha sucedido a la proscrita».
languages.original_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso aunque quisiéramos, mon-keigh, es imposible reproducir fácilmente una joya espiritual. Pero no te revelaré los secretos de mi especie, pues también tú tienes la culpa de lo que le ha sucedido a la proscrita».

languages.text: « Même si nous le souhaitions, mon-keigh, il est particulièrement difficile de recréer une pierre-esprit. Mais je ne vous révélerai pas les secrets de mes semblables, car vous êtes vous aussi responsable de ce qui est arrivé à l'Errante. »
languages.original_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

traits.locale_text: « Même si nous le souhaitions, mon-keigh, il est particulièrement difficile de recréer une pierre-esprit. Mais je ne vous révélerai pas les secrets de mes semblables, car vous êtes vous aussi responsable de ce qui est arrivé à l'Errante. »

languages.text: "Selbst wenn wir es wollten, Chem-Pan-Sey, es ist unmöglich, einen Seelenstein einfach so wiederherzustellen. Aber ich werde Euch nicht in die Geheimnisse der Meinen einweihen, denn Euch trifft auch Schuld an dem, was der Ausgestoßenen widerfahren ist."
languages.original_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst wenn wir es wollten, Chem-Pan-Sey, es ist unmöglich, einen Seelenstein einfach so wiederherzustellen. Aber ich werde Euch nicht in die Geheimnisse der Meinen einweihen, denn Euch trifft auch Schuld an dem, was der Ausgestoßenen widerfahren ist."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、たとえそう望んだとしても、魂縛石をそう簡単に再現することは不可能だ。しかし、私のキンの秘密をあなたに打ち明けるつもりはない。追放者に起きたことは、あなたにも責任があるのだから」
languages.original_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、たとえそう望んだとしても、魂縛石をそう簡単に再現することは不可能だ。しかし、私のキンの秘密をあなたに打ち明けるつもりはない。追放者に起きたことは、あなたにも責任があるのだから」

languages.text: "Çok istesek bile, ruh taşları öyle kolayca yeniden yaratılmıyor mon-keigh. Soyumun sırlarını sana açacak değilim çünkü Yurtsuz'un başına gelenlerde senin de parmağın var."
languages.original_text: "Even if we wanted to, mon-keigh, it is impossible to recreate a spirit stone so easily. But I will not let you into the secrets of my kin, for you are also at fault for what has happened to the Outcast."

traits.locale_text: "Çok istesek bile, ruh taşları öyle kolayca yeniden yaratılmıyor mon-keigh. Soyumun sırlarını sana açacak değilim çünkü Yurtsuz'un başına gelenlerde senin de parmağın var."
